contentList.content: The Runesmith Tradition, often passed down through dwarven lineages, is a blending of ancient craftsmanship with arcane study. Rooted in the rich heritage of dwarven clans, wizards of this tradition believe that true power lies in the careful inscription of runes, allowing them to bind and harness magic in tangible forms.

The Runesmith Tradition, often passed down through dwarven lineages, is a blending of ancient craftsmanship with arcane study. Rooted in the rich heritage of dwarven clans, wizards of this tradition believe that true power lies in the careful inscription of runes, allowing them to bind and harness magic in tangible forms.
An infinite scroll that allows the user to cast the spell Power Word Kill.
